rorgmod:Abstract Rorg Card.NAME: ERROR CARD
rorgmod:Abstract Rorg Card.DESCRIPTION: RorgMod went wrong! Please tell @prod#0339 at STS Discord.

rorgmod:Loose Screws.NAME: Loose Screws
rorgmod:Loose Screws.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. Whenever you play an Attack this turn, gain 1 Orb slot. NL Exhaust.

rorgmod:Zing-Zap.NAME: Zing-Zap
rorgmod:Zing-Zap.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block for each Lightning you have. Deal !D! damage.

rorgmod:Ventilation Error.NAME: Ventilation Error
rorgmod:Ventilation Error.DESCRIPTION: Evoke your next Orb twice. Apply !M! Weak to ALL enemies. NL Exhaust.

rorgmod:SQL Injection.NAME: SQL Injection
rorgmod:SQL Injection.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. If you have channeled 2 or more Orbs this turn, apply !M! Vulnerable.

rorgmod:Overcurrent.NAME: Overcurrent
rorgmod:Overcurrent.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Orb slots. After 3 turns, Lose !M! Orb slots. NL Exhaust.
rorgmod:Overcurrent.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Orb slots. After 3 turns, Evoke your first 3 Orbs and Lose !M! Orb slots. NL Exhaust.

rorgmod:Antivirus.NAME: Antivirus
rorgmod:Antivirus.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block for each enemy in combat.

rorgmod:LRU Cache.NAME: LRU Cache
rorgmod:LRU Cache.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. Cycle orbs clockwise 1 slot. Trigger the passive of your next orb !M! times.

rorgmod:Critical Section.NAME: Critical Section
rorgmod:Critical Section.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Lock-On and Vulnerable to ALL enemies. NL Exhaust.

rorgmod:Fragmentation.NAME: Fragmentation
rorgmod:Fragmentation.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage twice to ALL enemies. Lose 1 Orb slot.

rorgmod:Propelled Flight.NAME: Propelled Flight
rorgmod:Propelled Flight.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block twice. If you have 2 or more Dexterity, gain !B! Block during your next turn.

rorgmod:Pusher Props.NAME: Pusher Props
rorgmod:Pusher Props.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage twice. If you have 2 or more Strength, apply !M! Weak.

rorgmod:Malware.NAME: Malware
rorgmod:Malware.DESCRIPTION: Evoke your rightmost Dark. It hits ALL enemies.
rorgmod:Malware.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Evoke your rightmost Dark. It hits ALL enemies. Channel 1 Dark.

rorgmod:Radar Scan.NAME: Radar Scan
rorgmod:Radar Scan.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Lock-On to ALL enemies. NL Exhaust.

rorgmod:Steady Aim.NAME: Steady Aim
rorgmod:Steady Aim.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! block twice. Apply 1 Lock-On !M! times.

rorgmod:Centralize.NAME: Centralize
rorgmod:Centralize.DESCRIPTION: The next Orb you would Evoke is Evoked an additional !M! times.

rorgmod:Storm.NAME: Storm
rorgmod:Storm.DESCRIPTION: Every time you Channel Lightning, gain 1 temporary Strength.

rorgmod:Overheat.NAME: Overheat
rorgmod:Overheat.DESCRIPTION: Every time you Evoke Lightning this turn, apply !M! Vulnerable. NL Exhaust.

rorgmod:Go for the Eyes.NAME: Go for the Eyes
rorgmod:Go for the Eyes.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you would apply any Debuff to an enemy, apply !M! more.

rorgmod:Hot Sockets.NAME: Hot Sockets
rorgmod:Hot Sockets.DESCRIPTION: Evoke your next orb. Deal !D! damage to a random enemy for each empty orb slot.

rorgmod:Shadowmeld.NAME: Shadowmeld
rorgmod:Shadowmeld.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you channel an Orb, trigger the passive ability of all Dark orbs.

rorgmod:Biogeneration.NAME: Biogeneration
rorgmod:Biogeneration.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. Channel 1 Plasma. NL Exhaust.

rorgmod:Volatility.NAME: Volatility
rorgmod:Volatility.DESCRIPTION: The first time you Evoke Plasma each turn, draw !M! cards. Channel 1 Plasma.

rorgmod:Thunder Strike.NAME: Thunder Strike
rorgmod:Thunder Strike.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to a random enemy for each Lightning Channeled this combat.

rorgmod:Neutron Shower.NAME: Neutron Shower
rorgmod:Neutron Shower.DESCRIPTION: Randomize all of your channeled orbs. Trigger the passive of all orbs. NL Exhaust.
rorgmod:Neutron Shower.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Randomize all of your channeled orbs. Trigger the passive of all orbs.

rorgmod:Fuse Blower.NAME: Fuse Blower
rorgmod:Fuse Blower.DESCRIPTION: Channel 2 Lightning, Shuffle a *Burn into your draw pile.

rorgmod:Denial of Service.NAME: Denial of Service
rorgmod:Denial of Service.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. If the enemy intends to attack, deal !D! damage again.

rorgmod:Searing Blow.NAME: Searing Blow
rorgmod:Searing Blow.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Can be Upgraded any number of times.

rorgmod:Immolate.NAME: Immolate
rorgmod:Immolate.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. NL Add a *Burn into your draw pile.

rorgmod:Hexaburn.NAME: Hexaburn
rorgmod:Hexaburn.DESCRIPTION: Unplayable. NL At the end of your turn, take !M! damage.

rorgmod:Catalyst.NAME: Catalyst
rorgmod:Catalyst.DESCRIPTION: Double the enemy's Poison. NL Exhaust.

rorgmod:Black Ice.NAME: Black Ice
rorgmod:Black Ice.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you Evoke Frost, Channel 1 Dark.

rorgmod:Defragment.NAME: Defragment
rorgmod:Defragment.DESCRIPTION: Lightning deals !M! more damage for each Lightning you currently have.

rorgmod:Biased Cognition.NAME: Biased Cognition
rorgmod:Biased Cognition.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Focus. NL At the start of your turn, lose 1 Focus.

rorgmod:Leap.NAME: Leap
rorgmod:Leap.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Next turn, draw 1 additional card.

rorgmod:Auto-Shields.NAME: Auto-Shields
rorgmod:Auto-Shields.DESCRIPTION: At the end of your turn, gain !M! Block for each Buff and Debuff you have.

rorgmod:Accuracy.NAME: Accuracy
rorgmod:Accuracy.DESCRIPTION: ALL 0 cost Attacks deal !M! additional damage.

rorgmod:Claw.NAME: Claw
rorgmod:Claw.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Increase the damage of ALL Claw cards by !M! this combat.
rorgmod:Claw.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Increase the damage of ALL 0 cost Attacks by !M! this combat.

rorgmod:Follow-Up.NAME: Follow-Up
rorgmod:Follow-Up.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If the last card played this combat was an Attack, gain [W] and draw 1 card.

rorgmod:Phantasmal Killer.NAME: Phantasmal Killer
rorgmod:Phantasmal Killer.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your next turn, Gamble. Next turn, your Attacks deal double damage.

rorgmod:Reflex.NAME: Reflex
rorgmod:Reflex.DESCRIPTION: Unplayable. NL If this card is discarded from your hand, draw !M! cards. NL Exhaust.
rorgmod:Reflex.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Unplayable. NL If this card is discarded from your hand, draw !M! cards.

rorgmod:Storm of Steel.NAME: Storm of Steel
rorgmod:Storm of Steel.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you Discard a card, Add 1 *Shiv into your hand.
rorgmod:Storm of Steel.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Discard your hand. Add 1 *Shiv+ into your hand.

rorgmod:Tools of the Trade.NAME: Tools of the Trade
rorgmod:Tools of the Trade.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, draw 1 card and discard 1 card.
rorgmod:Tools of the Trade.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL At the start of your turn, draw 1 card and discard 1 card.

rorgmod:Sentinel.NAME: Sentinel
rorgmod:Sentinel.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL If you have exhausted a card this turn, NL gain [R] [R].

rorgmod:Wraith Form.NAME: Sanfu Form
rorgmod:Wraith Form.DESCRIPTION: Play the first card you Discard every turn.

rorgmod:Wraith Form 2.NAME: Fleur Form
rorgmod:Wraith Form 2.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you Discard a card, Gain !M! Block and Deal !M! Damage to a random enemy.

rorgmod:Tendon Slice.NAME: Tendon Slice
rorgmod:Tendon Slice.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. If target has Weak, Deal !M! additional damage.

Decay.NAME: Decay
Decay.DESCRIPTION: Redraw. NL Unplayable. NL At the end of your turn, take 2 damage.

Doubt.NAME: Doubt
Doubt.DESCRIPTION: Redraw. NL Unplayable. NL At the end of your turn, gain 1 Weak.

Normality.NAME: Normality
Normality.DESCRIPTION: Unplayable. NL While in hand, you cannot play more than 3 cards this turn.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: I can only play up to NL #r3 cards this turn.
Redraw. NL Unplayable. NL You cannot play more than
cards per turn. NL You have played

Pain.NAME: Pain
Pain.DESCRIPTION: Redraw. NL Unplayable. NL While in hand, NL lose 1 HP whenever you play another card.

Regret.NAME: Regret
Regret.DESCRIPTION: Redraw. NL Unplayable. NL At the end of your turn, lose HP equal to the number of cards in your hand.

Shame.NAME: Shame
Shame.DESCRIPTION: Redraw. NL Unplayable. NL At the end of your turn, gain 1 Frail.

rorgmod:Injury.NAME: Injury
rorgmod:Injury.DESCRIPTION: Redraw. NL Unplayable. NL When drawn, Gain 5 Constricted and Exhaust.

rorgmod:Feeble.NAME: Feeble
rorgmod:Feeble.DESCRIPTION: Redraw. NL Unplayable. NL When drawn, Gain 1 Vulnerable.

rorgmod:Fever.NAME: Fever
rorgmod:Fever.DESCRIPTION: Redraw. NL Unplayable. NL While in hand, lose 1 HP for each [E] spent.

rorgmod:Hardcode.NAME: Hardcode
rorgmod:Hardcode.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Lockdown. Orbs Evoke twice as many times for the next !M! turns. NL Exhaust.
